data.title: Paranormal Expo
data.text:
2024 Expo Speakers

Three Appalachian Witches

​

Ashley Conner, Misty Conner, and Pat Bussard O’Keefe are descendants of the mystics of the mountains, Appalachian granny women, also known as granny witches. Each of them is a talented psychic, medium, and Reiki Master/natural healer. One member is a Consulting Hypnotist, trained through the National Guild of Hypnotists. This popular witchy trio are authors, and their latest books are: Three Appalachian Witches: Moon Magick, Mirror Magick, and the Witches Ladder, Appalachian Granny Witch Magick, and Appalachian Conjuring. They host a bi-monthly podcast, Appalachian Cauldron, answering with insight and humor, magickal and personal questions posed by their audience. These busy conjurers were featured in the documentary Season of the Witch, which can be found on many streaming services. They have appeared on television and a number of podcasts and radio programs, including George Noory's Coast-to-Coast AM. Pat, Ashley and Misty are currently working on their own documentary about Appalachian granny women titled, There’s Magick in Them Mountains. The film is set to premiere in the fall of 2025. These Three Appalachian Witches have traveled the country conducting seances, gallery readings, energy healing sessions, classes, and workshops on a plethora of spiritual and paranormal topics.

The Hex Baby Jules Nolan

​

Jules Nolan has been an occult practitioner for over a decade, and has been a Tarot reader for eight years. She is a Polytheistic Irish Pagan and has a passion teaching others about paganism, the history of occult practices as well as the lore and history of Vampires.

If you have questions, would like to become a client of hers, or have any business inquiries, she can be contacted via her many social media platforms or via email at thehexbabyofficial@gmail.com

Theresa's Haunted History

of the Tri-State

​

Theresa Racer is a lifelong resident of Appalachia with a love of local history and all things spooky. As a self-dubbed 'Fortean Historian,' she has combined those two passions into Theresa's Haunted History of the Tri-State, a blog featuring hauntings, ghost stories, UFO's, monsters, and all things strange and unusual in the Mountain State and beyond. In addition to documenting and writing about paranormal topics, Theresa is a paranormal investigator with over 20 years experience in the field. She is currently serving as a Lead Investigator, Case Manager, and Historian for Spectral Research and Investigations.

Paranormal Nightmare TV

The Fourman Brothers

​

Shaun, Josh, and Rocky Fourman are three brothers traveling the country to help families in their paranormal experiences. We have had tremendous support over our 15 years of investigating and would like to share our stories of the paranormal with you, our supporters.

Haunt & Heal

Become a Vendor for our 2024 Event

2 Options for Expo 2024 Vendors:

Option A: Includes space inside venue, 8 foot table and 2 vendor passes - $50 (may or may not include electricity, let us know if you need it upon booking)

Option B: Set up outdoors at the entrance to venue, bring your own 10x10 tent, table and chairs. This option does not include electricity. Includes 2 vendor passes. - $40

Additional passes may be purchased at $10.00 each, maximum 2 additional passes per person.

NOTE for vendors:

This is a family friendly event.

Reserving a table is not finalized until submission is reviewed. Once submission is approved a request for additional information about you, your merchandise/table setup and advertising photos will be sent to you. If you do not respond to this email within 30 days your application will be voided and your reservation refunded in full. In addition to this, photos of your team and/or merchandise must be provided as well as a logo for your team or business.

If your vendor request is not approved your payment will be refunded back to you in full.
